Body: I've had an iPod Touch for a while and am used  to controlling the music player without having to take the device from my pocket. I've had a look around for headphones that will work with the Samsung Galaxy S's TRRS connector and for players that would work with those headphones but haven't seen any combination that looks like it would work. Is this achievable? I'm also happy to consider alternatives like Bluetooth if that would work.
Title: What are good Android headphones with Play/Pause and volume controls?

history.Text: I've had an iPod Touch for a while and am used  to controlling the music player without having to take the device from my pocket. I've had a look around for headphones that will work with the Samsung Galaxy S's TRRS connector and for players that would work with those headphones but haven't seen any combination that looks like it would work. Is this achievable? I'm also happy to consider alternatives like Bluetooth if that would work.
Android headphones and player with play/pause and volume controls on headphones
What are good Android headphones with Play/Pause and volume controls?
